name: Drawga
description:
A small little RPG Maker Fan game I made some years ago . It's based on the Drawga series by the wonderful Drawfee Show (https://www.youtube.com/@Drawfee) so some of the art is taken from the show. It does have some of my own pixel art and enemy designs. I am sharing for a love of the show.

The game probably won't take you more than an hour if you read all the text and sadly ends abruptly due to the show not being finished when I was making it. However I hope you enjoy this little bit of fun and humour, partially my own, partially that of the wonderful Drawfee.
